titles.title: Water Debt Relief Act of 2021

To require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to carry out a residential emergency relief program to provide payment assistance for households to retain water service, and for other purposes.
Water Debt Relief Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

bill.summary:
Water Debt Relief Act of 2021
This bill requires the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to implement a residential emergency relief program. Under the program, the EPA must reimburse public water systems for providing forgiveness of the debts and fees of customers who incurred new debts on or after March 1, 2020.
